title: All Stellar Blade outfits and how to unlock them

html:
Image: Shift Up/Sony Interactive Entertainment

Jazz Stewart is a Gaming Journalist and multimedia creator passionate about storytelling and game design. When he isn’t writing, he’s gaming; when he’s not gaming, he wishes he were.

Eve’s outfits in Stellar Blade comprise a truly massive wardrobe. Following the release of the game’s complete edition, there are now more than 100 outfits in the game. You’re bound to stumble upon at least one outfit that’ll make you look stellar.

You’ll start with one default outfit (two if you’re playing the deluxe or complete edition). You can unlock 37 additional outfits during your first playthrough, and many of those receive alternate colors throughout new game plus. If you preordered the game, or bought the deluxe or the complete edition, you’ll also gain access to 25 extra costumes.

With a large chunk of the game’s best outfits locked behind missable events and locations, you’re not going to want to miss out on our in-progress Stellar Blade outfit locations guide, which covers all outfits you can unlock in the base game.

All outfits in Stellar Blade

1/36Image: Shift UP/ Sony Inter

Here’s how you unlock the following Stellar Blade outfits:

  1. Skin Suit — Available as soon as you start the game.
  2. Planet Diving Suit (7th) — Available as soon as you start the game.
  3. Planet Diving Suit (2nd) — Can be purchased from Roxanne’s shop once her store affinity reaches level 2.
  4. Racer’s High — Found on the west side of the Wasteland.
  5. Wasteland Adventurer — Found at the bottom of the Flooded Commercial District in Eidos 7. You must accept the Oblivion Side Mission to drain the area of water.
  6. Planet Diving Suit (7th) V2 — Found on Eidos 7 in the Monorail Station.
  7. Red Passion — Found on Eidos 7 at the Construction Site. When you need to control the steel beams to cross a gap, use the right one to destroy the wall on the right side across the gap. Inside the new cavity will be a chest holding the design.
  8. Cyber Magician — Found in the Wasteland Basin.
  9. Holiday Rabbit — Defeat the Corruptor in Wasteland Basin.
  10. Black Pearl — Collect all 49 Can collectibles.
  11. Orca Exploration Suit — Can be purchased from Roxanne’s shop once her store affinity reaches level 2.
  12. Moutan Peony— Can be purchased from Roxanne’s shop once her store affinity reaches level 3.
  13. Cybernetic Dress — Can be purchased from Roxanne’s shop once her store affinity reaches level 3.
  14. Keyhole Suit — Can be purchased from Roxanne’s shop once her store affinity reaches level 3.
  15. Sporty Yellow — Found in the Wasteland’s forbidden area.
  16. Junk Mechanic — Can be purchased from Lyle’s shop once his store affinity reaches level 3.
  17. Daily Denim — Can be purchased from Lyle’s shop once his store affinity reaches level 3.
  18. Junk Mechanic — Can be purchased from Lyle’s shop once his store affinity reaches level 3.
  19. Black Full Dress — Can be purchased from Lyle’s shop once his store affinity reaches level 2.
  20. Daily Biker — Can be purchased from Lyle’s shop once his store affinity reaches level 2.
  21. Daily Mascot — Found in Matrix 11’s Underground Sewer.
  22. Daily Force — Found in Matrix 11’s Rotten Labyrinth.
  23. Daily Knitted Dress — Found in Matrix 11’s Underground.
  24. Fluffy Bear — Reward for finishing the Memories in the Doll Quest.
  25. Planet Diving Suit (3rd) — Found in Abyss Levoire.
  26. Daily Sailor — Found in Great Desert.
  27. Sky Ace — Reward for the Encounter Quest.
  28. Black Wave — Found in Great Desert.
  29. Blue Monsoon — Reward for the Precious Treasure Quest.
  30. Cybernetic Bondage — Found in Great Desert’s Oasis.
  31. Punk Top — Found in Eidos 9.
  32. Motivation — Found in Eidos 9.
  33. Orca Engineer — Found in Spire 4.
  34. Black Rose — Found in Spire 4’s Raphael Space Center.
  35. Photogenic — Found in Spire 4.
  36. Prototype Planet Diving Suit — Can be purchased from Roxanne’s shop after completing Spire 4.
  37. La Vie en Rose — Reward for the Recruit Passcode Specialists Quest.
  38. Ocean Maid — Collect all 25 Fish.

We’re still working on unlocking all new game plus and DLC-exclusive outfits, and will update this guide soon.
